website_summaries.verdict: Durable, professional grade meat claws that make shredding smoked meat a breeze.
pros: A good companion for your home kitchen
Shred and lift meat and hot foods, toss salads, and hold food for slicing with these claws
While they are plastic and light, they are incredibly sharp and heavy-duty
The meat claws are easy to hold onto, making the work on your hands and wrists much less taxing
These meat claws have not only cut time in half but are a relief for hands and wrists
Pop in the dishwasher with no issues
cons: Some may find the claws flimsy
On the backside, there are numerous voids all the way down to the tiny points of the claws
These voids trap meat shreds and result in having to make extra effort to clean

customer_reviews.title: Get the red ones they work the best
customer_reviews.text: Man these things are super duper. Not only can I hold them like that guy in that movie (y'all know the one I'm talking about) but it will shred the beepidybeeep out of some barbeque pork y'all. I can't wait to start processing my venison and going all Grillaholic claw on it! Yowser that will be good Saturday night drinking a little moonshine tearin' up some red meat kinda fun y'all! Buy. These. Not only are they cheap fun but work hard, kinda like my last date!!
customer_reviews.author: Wendi

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these things. They are great at picking the pork butt or other cuts of meat up and pulled pork is a breeze. Even my father that won’t try anything new used these on a pork butt and loved them it about blew me away to hear him say those things work great. They really do and actually had to buy another pair as my sister kept borrowing mine and when I needed them had to walk across the street to get mine so I just bought another set and let her keep them.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Sheldon

customer_reviews.title: Strong and sturdy meat handlers
customer_reviews.text: How nice! The first thing I used the claws for was lifting a roast onto the platter then holding steady for carving. Gives more stability than a meat fork, that's for sure. I shredded just a little of the roast to see how the claws handled the job. Very efficient and faster than using two forks. The fact they can go in the dishwasher and never rust or corrode is great. Would highly recommend the Grillaholics Meat Claws, they are perfect for lifting meat out of the roaster or off the grill and the tines are sharp and sturdy for shredding.
customer_reviews.author: beagle001

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and Price
customer_reviews.text: These shredding claws worked as we hoped they would. They were easy to hold, they helped us lift the meat and did a great job of shredding it. They cleaned easily in the dishwasher and were reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: KCB

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for Dad!
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a gift for my dad for father's day but he is out of town so I haven't been able to give them to him yet or use them but I can tell they are sturdy and very sharp and will work very well! Overall they seem to be a really good quality and I am excited to give them to him!
customer_reviews.author: Celcuddy4817

customer_reviews.title: Why don't you have this yet?!
customer_reviews.text: Originally, I purchased these to use to pull apart hot, freshly smoked meat. Last night, however, I was excited to give them a try with a large pork loin that I had in the slow cooker. AWESOME! So much easier than using two forks to shred the meat apart. The meat claws are easy to hold onto, making the work your hands and wrists do much less taxing. The meat shred apart quickly and when I was all done, it was great being able to throw them in the dishwasher. I will be buying these as gifts and using mine regularly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I've used to pick up meat and to shred meat. Easy to clean by hand or dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: KAG

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and no good.
customer_reviews.text: Gripping this hurts the palms of your hands because of the plastic. Its so flimpsy that you have to hold it tight. But because the plastic is so thin, it digs into your hand the harder you hold it. But then if you aren't holding it firmly, you can't tear up any meats whatsoever. Threw them away.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. MomofTwins

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than expected and wider in teeth than expected but it’s a good product. Very well made!
customer_reviews.author: Ducky

customer_reviews.title: Not designed and manufactured  very well.
customer_reviews.text: Product pictures really don't clearly show the full backside so it is easy to not understand the backside is not solid. There are numerous voids all the way down to the tiny points of the claws. These voids trap meat shreds and are an extra effort to clean. I think I'll just look for some solid long salad type forks instead and put these in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Gadgetman

customer_reviews.title: These WORK!
customer_reviews.text: Gift to daughter/son-in-law (He's the grilling king) -- and these really work. Had tried another brand but they were not especially good. These are also handy for pulling apart roasts done in a pot, making pulled pork, etc -- doesn't have to be just for grilled meats!
customer_reviews.author: LittleTank

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and are useful shredding some meat.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my son. He loves cooking and grilling. He loves these claws to rip up some pork roast and barbeque. They are very thick, sturdy, and well made. After receiving the product the seller even got in touch with us to make sure we were happy with their product. They have excellent customer service and it's nice to know that they really do care. These also have a lifetime warranty which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Does the job for you
customer_reviews.text: Brought these as a gift for my mother in law, she put them right to use with pull porker and they did a wonderful job. Definitely a must have in every kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: alexis

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: I'd been wanting to try these for some time and wish I had gotten them long ago. Sure beats the devil out of shredding with a table fork. Makes a good "threat" for when my husband is messing with me while I'm cooking. lol
customer_reviews.author: redheaded farmer

customer_reviews.title: Great but..
customer_reviews.text: While these do work great the wording came off on to my hands during first time use. Still works wonders though using them to do pulled pork!
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: BuY them, you won’t regret it
customer_reviews.text: These suckers are sharp, and ready get in there and shred your meat perfectly. I’ve used them a few times but forgot to get a photo, so here’s a photo of the shredded chicken for tacos tonight! Worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: DBrooks

customer_reviews.title: Save your money!
customer_reviews.text: These are awkward and arent very effective. Wish I didnt wait to use them and miss the return deadline. Definitely not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought these as a gift for my husband for his ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for my husband for his Christmas stocking. He was surprisingly excited by them and ready to make food he could use them with. He got the chance with the Christmas ham.. lifting it and moving it from the pan while I got the drippings for gravy then again when it was time to slice it. Handy little suckers, and they went right into the dishwasher. Win win.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa P.

customer_reviews.title: Dad Gift
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for my father for a gift and he loves these things. He runs around in true dad fashion yelling that he’s barbecue wolverine now.
customer_reviews.author: CailyxKurai

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: These things are great. Pulled apart the meat easily. Also, good for grabbing meat out of the oven.
customer_reviews.author: Russ Lefebvre

customer_reviews.title: It does take a bit of a learning curve ( best way that I found to do it is to ...
customer_reviews.text: I tried to use a cheaper version of meat claws made by charbroil and they went directly in the trash after I bought these. It does take a bit of a learning curve ( best way that I found to do it is to take small pieces, hold one next to it and pull the meat through with the other). No longer any big chunks but almost completely even pieces. WIN WIN.
customer_reviews.author: OverKill62

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband but I have used them more than he has. These are perfect for chicken tacos and other crock pot recipes as well as grilled meats.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Giftie
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a friend. He seemed to enjoy it very much. There was the comment made about playing "Wolverine" in addition to the intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Christ

customer_reviews.title: Serious smokers and grillers only need apply.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for Christmas and already in love! Super sharp points let you impale any chunk of meat, and they're super sturdy so you can shred said chunk of meat Wolverine style. All one piece super hard plastic means they won't fall apart, plus the ability to drop them in the dishwasher means I can spend more quality time eating my chunk of smoked deliciousness. Awesome product, not sure how I survived with regular forks and my bare hands before now.
customer_reviews.author: mng

customer_reviews.title: These are plastic.
customer_reviews.text: I thought these would be metal with a silicone handle? I’m disappointed that they are plastic. With that said, they do the job, it’s not like you’re cooking with them in the meat. Moved a while chicken to a plate in a snap.
customer_reviews.author: MMac

customer_reviews.title: Works great and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: These claws work great for grilling and for my slow cooker. They make it easy to remove meat from the grill and very hot slow cooker without getting burned. Shredding is a breeze as well. When you are done, just pop them into the dishwasher and they are good to go for the next meal. Great product and great price.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great meat shredders
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to use so glad i picked these! Great to have and use when BBQ.

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: These were a Christmas gift for our son in law. He loves them! They are solid & sturdy well made. They arrived quickly. Great customer service.

customer_reviews.title: Awesomeness!
customer_reviews.text: Grips just right in hands - sturdy and fun to use!! Made shredding my InstantPot chicken a breeze!!

These "meat claws" have not only cut her time in half but it has been a welcomed relief for her hands and wrists.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tools for all pork lovers!
customer_reviews.text: The Meat Claws by Grillaholics is a great product. They are made of very sturdy plastic and shred the meat very well. The tips of the claws are very sharp to dig into your juicy meat and render it helpless in your hands. Even though my pork butt is always very juicy and tender, these tools make shredding the meat fast and easy. I would recommend these to all lovers of meat. Oh, and cleaning them is a breeze! Thank you, Santa Claws! (spelling mistake intended;)!
customer_reviews.author: James David Smith

customer_reviews.title: They do what they're supposed to, but the open ...
customer_reviews.text: They do what they're supposed to, but the open inside of the claw makes cleaning more difficult. If I were to purchase a similar product again, I would opt for solid claws.

I am so happy with this product, I just bought two more for my relatives. product_meta.title: Grillaholics BBQ Meat Shredder Claws - Wolverine Style Ultra-Sharp Blades Quickly Lift Handle & Shred Meats - Best Dishwasher Safe Bear Claw Pulled Pork Meat Shredders in BBQ Grill Accessories (Red)
feature_bullets: SHRED LIKE WOLVERINE – GO PRO OR GO HOME: The name says it all: Grillaholics. We're addicted to this stuff! We’re not just weekend warriors, we’re daily grill masters, delivering you the MOST durable, HIGHEST professional grade meat claws, with ultra-sharp meat shredder tines, making light work of looking PRO as you masterfully shred your delicious smoked meats.

THE JACK OF ALL TRADES – POWER SHRED ANY HUNK FAST: Drop those dainty little time consuming forks and pick up real warriors tools! Wolverine style bear claws lift, handle, shred, hold and cut meat in half the time. Giant smoking meat hunk? Impale it! Gorgeous smoked pork? Shred it! Delicate garden salad? Toss it! Spaghetti Squash? Annihilate it. You get the point…these pulled pork shredders do it all.

SUPREME CLEAN – DISHWASHER SAFE: Doesn’t your meat deserve your best attention? Don’t waste time picking bits from your bbq claw set. Do your guests (and your taste buds) the ultimate favor – get these, shred up, toss ‘em in the dishwasher, and watch as they come out LIKE NEW – no matter how hard you worked your shredding claws that day.
